titleStmt.title: A brief sum of certain worm-wood lectures Translated out of all languages into Billings-Gate dialogue. By Martin Parker.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Wright, W. Thackera[y]; and T. Passenger,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on A1v reads: Certain wormwood lectures translated out of several languages into Billings-Gate dialogue.
In filmed copy imprint the "y" of "Thackeray" failed to print.
Reproduction of the original in the Magdalene College Library, Cambridge University, Cambridge, England.
